description: Waterbondage finally does its first shoot at the Armory! Fayth Deluca is tied up and thoroughly cleaned up, several floors beneath ground level in the Armory shower room. This location has a truly creepy atmosphere, which blends nicely with what we do here. Fayth blends nicely with what we do here as well. She is charming, sexy, tough and alot of fun to use and abuse. We hope to be seeing more of Fayth. And we plan on doing more shoots at the Armory soon. Stay tuned.
title: Fayth Deluca
